txt.en: A monstrous breed of spider has built a nest south of Esteldín, threatening the security of the outpost's inhabitants.
A monstrous breed of spider has built a nest south of Esteldín, threatening the security of the outpost's inhabitants.\n\nYou should defeat the queen of the spiders in the Snares.

The Kingsfell Spider-queen is somewhere in the spider-lair south of Esteldín.\n\nYou should slay the queen of the spiders who threaten the people of Esteldín, thereby lessening the danger posed by the foul creatures.
'You have done well, [placeholder]. The death of the spider-queen should throw the entire lair into disarray.'
Dagoras is at Esteldín.\n\nYou should speak with Dagoras and inform him that you have slain the spider-queen.
'The spiders of the Kingsfell will be crippled if their queen is slain, [placeholder].'
'With their queen dead, the spiders will not be so bold.'
'Spiders are a foul spawn of the Enemy. You have dealt them a tremendous blow.'

The Kingsfell Spider-queen is somewhere in the spider-lair south of Esteldín.\n\nYou should slay the queen of the spiders who threaten the people of Esteldín, thereby lessening the danger posed by the foul creatures.
